overview.des: The main objective of this React Certification course is to help you become familiar with the process and gain the skills you'll need to become a professional React developer. You will learn the fundamentals of React through self-paced and instructor-led training to understand and build React components and structure applications with Redux.

content.data: Introduction to web design and development
Parsing JSON data using Javascript(Ajax and fetch API)
Introduction to Node and React Js
Finally assigning tasks day by day according to the topics discussed in daily class.
